page.title: 19HOLMESFIELD PARISH CHURCH
page.content: Holmesfield Parish Church,St.Swithin's serves our area.The vicar described that the Church tries to give help to all sections of the community and that besides unemployment the main problem centres around the possible loneliness of elderly people and lack of shopping facilities.Besides the 'good neighbour' scheme a voluntary meals on wheels service also helps. The church doesn't have a Sunday School but it does have a 'J' (Jesus) club attended by children from a wide area. The vicar also visits Penny Acres School to give services and lessons for the pupils. The money the church needs for its activities is raised from the collections at services,from garden parties,jumble sales and Christmas fairs.
